name: Native Charley Child Sandals - Infants to Children
description: From wading in the waves to dodging cracks in the sidewalk, the comfy sandals have your kiddos covered. With a soft and light EVA foam sole the Charley sandals protect tiny tootsies while providing comfortable support.EVA foam and smooth PU construction is durable, comfortable and weatherproof.Satin polyurethane straps have a soft EVA lining that’s gentle on soft skin.Dual hook-and-loop closure is easy to operate.Textured tread is grippy, not slippy.This shoe fits small, so Native recommends going up one full size.
